name: Wakey Wakey (dos, Holy Pangolin)
description:
A digital boardgame for four players.  

Be the first to wake up the geese. Their sleepy minds dream both nightmares and happy dreams, that will travel onto your board and act respectively like stoppers or boosters. Beware - if you're not careful, a bicycle can transport you into a tornado or a stop sign! 

Also beware - the gameplay is very slow at the beginning;) It needs much improvement.

Controls: ARROWS to move, SPACE to pick your spot (as for now you can travel only 1 or 2 steps forward).

Made by Agata Nawrot and Sebastian Krzyszkowiak at Castle Game Jam 2018 in Örebro (Sweden).

Inspired by the spirited white wagtails and sleepy families of Canada geese that we met in the park near the Örebro castle.
